Sentencas: The Ruddlesden-Popper type oxide (Pr0.9La0.1)(2.0)Ni0.74Cu0.21Ga0.05O4+delta ((PL)(2.0)NCG) is important for oxygen separating membranes and intermediate temperature solid-oxide fuel cell (SOFC) cathodes if the high chemical stability of CO2 is required.
Titulo: The phase stability of the Ruddlesden-Popper type oxide (Pr0.9La0.1)2.0Ni0.74Cu0.21Ga0.05O4+δ in an oxidizing environment

Sentencas: This oxide exhibits good phase stability in the air at high temperatures, whereas at intermediate temperatures it demonstrates a reversible decomposition into Pr4Ni3O10+delta' (a higher member of the Ruddlesden-Popper series) and praseodymium oxide phases, which are barriers to the oxygen transport.
Titulo: The phase stability of the Ruddlesden-Popper type oxide (Pr0.9La0.1)2.0Ni0.74Cu0.21Ga0.05O4+δ in an oxidizing environment

Sentencas: The phase decomposition conditions of (PL)(2.0)NCG, as a function of temperature and oxygen pressure, have been examined.
Titulo: The phase stability of the Ruddlesden-Popper type oxide (Pr0.9La0.1)2.0Ni0.74Cu0.21Ga0.05O4+δ in an oxidizing environment

Sentencas: The defined phase stability window of temperature and oxygen partial pressure for (PL)(2.0)NCG can be the instruction for practical applications.
Titulo: The phase stability of the Ruddlesden-Popper type oxide (Pr0.9La0.1)2.0Ni0.74Cu0.21Ga0.05O4+δ in an oxidizing environment

Sentencas: The influence of calcination temperature and A-site deficiency on the material's phase stability are discussed to guide the development of Ruddlesden-Popper type materials with improved stability.
Titulo: The phase stability of the Ruddlesden-Popper type oxide (Pr0.9La0.1)2.0Ni0.74Cu0.21Ga0.05O4+δ in an oxidizing environment
